mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.contract_number contractNumber, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, a.state contractState, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` typeName, e.`name` moldName, f.company_name companyName FROM sys_staff_contract a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary e ON a.mold_id = e.id LEFT JOIN company_mation f ON a.company_id = f.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND a.contract_number LIKE '%${contractNumber}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_contract (id, contract_number, type_id, mold_id, start_time, end_time, use_expire_time, state, enclosure, staff_id, create_time, company_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{contractNumber}, #{typeId}, #{moldId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{useExpireTime}, '1', #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.contract_number contractNumber, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, a.state contractState, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, a.type_id typeId, a.mold_id moldId, a.company_id companyId FROM sys_staff_contract a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.contract_number contractNumber, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, a.state contractState, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` typeName, e.`name` moldName, f.company_name companyName FROM sys_staff_contract a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary e ON a.mold_id = e.id LEFT JOIN company_mation f ON a.company_id = f.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND b.id = #{staffId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
